doc:
Grant Show https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grant_Show 0 Grant Alan Show (born February 27, 1962) is an American actor best known for his role on Melrose Place as Jake Hanson, which he played from 1992 to 1997. Since 2017, Show portrays tycoon Blake Carrington in the reboot soap opera Dynasty. Grant_Alan_Show ( born February_27_,_1962 ) is an_American_actor best_known for his_role on Melrose_Place as Jake_Hanson , which he played from 1992 to 1997 . Since 2017 , Show portrays tycoon_Blake_Carrington in the_reboot_soap_opera_Dynasty .
